name: The Law Office of Doug Bend
overview:
With extensive experience advising small businesses and launching startups, Bend Law Group, PC, is focused on helping entrepreneurs implement practical legal steps to achieve their business goals.

From launching startups to facilitating the purchase or sale of businesses, we serve as outsourced general counsel to entrepreneurs who seek opportunities to add value to their business ventures.

We understand that your choice of business attorneys seems endless. The right firm, however, will not only help solve your legal problems, but will also play a key role in ensuring your company’s success. It is with this understanding that we commit our energy and experience to serving our clients’ interests and to resolving their legal concerns.

Please contact us at (415) 963-9670 or info@bendlawoffice.com for a legal check-up for your small business or to discuss launching your startup. We look forward to speaking with you soon.
